title: When was the technology about gadgets discovered? - Quora

response.answer_text: Radio existed in some form in the 1800's but was not applied militarily until the 20th century (1900's). In 1910 governments were still using telegraph for some things. Radio was first used militarily on airplanes, supposedly. Early televisions existed by around 1910 but did not become smaller and cheaper until about 1960. A variety of basic wooden and plastic toys existed in the 1920's to 1950's and earlier, but many of these were not very clever, but had aesthetic appeal, kind of like toy fishing lines with a hook for a wooden fish. Computers began to take off with code cracking during WWII: 1930's and 1940's. User interfaces were discovered in the 1950's to 1980's and beyond. Electronic toys took off in the 1980's and 1990's. Popular computer games began to be sold on floppy diskettes around the 1980's The 1990's is sometimes seen as the golden age of computer games like simcity 2000, civilization II, dark forces II, and diablo 2. Commercial drones developed in the 1990's, 2000's, and 2010's and beyond. Smartphones mostly developed in the 1990's, 2000's, and 2010's and beyond. Exponential efficiency was discovered around 2005 or earlier in relation to quantum computing.
